CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: A novel conjugated polymer of PBDT-TDPP-S was synthesized , which contains a donor unit of benzo [1,2b:4,5-b′]dithiophene in main chain and an acceptor unit of diketopyrrolopyrrole in side chain.

Let's think step by step.

1. PBDT: This is a conjugated polymer where P stands for Poly and BDT represents Benzo [1,2b:4,5-b′]dithiophene. So, Benzo [1,2b:4,5-b′]dithiophene is the material name.
2. TDPP: Diketopyrrolopyrrole is the material name mentioned in the text as the acceptor unit. So, Diketopyrrolopyrrole is the second material name.
3. PBDT-TDPP-S: This is the name of the synthesized conjugated polymer, which is a combination of PBDT and TDPP.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. Benzo [1,2b:4,5-b′]dithiophene (PBDT)
2. Diketopyrrolopyrrole (TDPP)
3. PBDT-TDPP-S (the synthesized conjugated polymer)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Benzo [1,2b:4,5-b′]dithiophene (PBDT) |
| Diketopyrrolopyrrole (TDPP) |
| PBDT-TDPP-S (the synthesized conjugated polymer) |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: A novel conjugated polymer of PBDT-TDPP-S was synthesized , which contains a donor unit of benzo [1,2b:4,5-b′]dithiophene in main chain and an acceptor unit of diketopyrrolopyrrole in side chain.

Let's think step by step.

1. PBDT-TDPP-S: This is the name of the synthesized conjugated polymer. It consists of a donor unit (PBDT) and an acceptor unit (TDPP) connected by a main chain (S).

Therefore, the property names in this paragraph are:

1. PBDT: A donor unit of benzo [1,2b:4,5-b′]dithiophene in the main chain.
2. TDPP: An acceptor unit of diketopyrrolopyrrole in the side chain.
3. S: The main chain connecting the donor and acceptor units.

These property names represent the structural components of the synthesized conjugated polymer.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

The only entity in the paragraph that clearly refers to a material property is the name of the synthesized conjugated polymer, PBDT-TDPP-S. However, it is not a property itself but rather the name of the material. Therefore, there are no explicit material properties mentioned in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PBDT-TDPP-S |

This table only includes the name of the synthesized conjugated polymer as it is the only entity in the paragraph that can be considered a material or compound. However, it is important to note that no specific material properties are mentioned in the paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: A novel conjugated polymer of PBDT-TDPP-S was synthesized , which contains a donor unit of benzo [1,2b:4,5-b′]dithiophene in main chain and an acceptor unit of diketopyrrolopyrrole in side chain.

Let's think step by step.

1. PBDT-TDPP-S: This is the name of the synthesized conjugated polymer. It can be considered as a single "Compound" or "Material" entity, but it can also be broken down into three parts: PBDT (donor unit of benzo [1,2b:4,5-b′]dithiophene in main chain), TDPP (acceptor unit of diketopyrrolopyrrole in side chain), and S (possibly a suffix indicating the presence of side chains).
2. benzo [1,2b:4,5-b′]dithiophene: This is the donor unit in the main chain of the conjugated polymer. It can be considered as a "Molecular Formula" or "Chemical Substance" entity.
3. diketopyrrolopyrrole: This is the acceptor unit in the side chain of the conjugated polymer. It can be considered as a "Molecular Formula" or "Chemical Substance" entity.

So, the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

1. PBDT-TDPP-S (Compound/Material)
2. benzo [1,2b:4,5-b′]dithiophene (Molecular Formula/Chemical Substance)
3. diketopyrrolopyrrole (Molecular Formula/Chemical Substance)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Based on the given paragraph, there are no explicit material property values mentioned. The paragraph only describes the synthesis of a new conjugated polymer (PBDT-TDPP-S) and its structural components (benzo [1,2b:4,5-b′]dithiophene and diketopyrrolopyrrole). Therefore, there are no clear "Property Value" entities in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PBDT-TDPP-S (novel conjugated polymer with a donor unit of benzo [1,2b:4,5-b′]dithiophene in main chain and an acceptor unit of diketopyrrolopyrrole in side chain) |
| benzo [1,2b:4,5-b′]dithiophene (donor unit of benzo [1,2b:4,5-b′]dithiophene in main chain) |
| diketopyrrolopyrrole (acceptor unit of diketopyrrolopyrrole in side chain) |
